author: Staff Reporter
text:
Ex servicemen grievance redressal and skill development meeting to be held in Collectorate here on January 8.

District Collector A. Gnanasekaran has asked the ex servicemen from Tiruvannamalai district to take part and therby benefit from the meeting.

He asked those ex servicemen who want to take part in the skill development session to contact the office of Assistant Director, Ex Servicemen welfare in the collectorate beforehand. -
title: Ex servicemen skill development meet on Jan. 8
